text: kezīyachimi bebahiru daricha keneberechiwi ketema bek’idamē (k’eni) weseni balefu gīzē besenibetachewi k’eni ‘āsawochachewi yetekemachu ẖonewi bemīmet’ulachewi gīzē (yeẖonewini) t’eyik’achewi፡፡ senibetinimi bemayakebirubeti (belēlawi) k’eni āyimet’ulachewimi፡፡ inidezīhu yamits’ubeti beneberuti mikiniyati inimokirachewaleni፡፡
